reviewText: My family and I had a great time playing through the Splig campaign. Everyone got to play a character with the PC taking role of Overlord. Used a Disciple Healer, a Mage Runemaster, and a Warrior Marshall with all expansion packs excluding Mists of Bilehall. Intro quest was fun with a couple of surprises, plenty of xp and gold for first city visit. Next side quest we got hammered as Skarn showed up blocking our way to alter and peril darkness just wore us down. Final goblin camp quest was going great, including the Healer taking down a Giant solo while separated from the party. Eventually overwhelmed by random monster spawns. Probably would have been wise to avoid side quest. Great RPG feel to game when app is used. Looking forward to seeing the next campaign release. App stated that it did not recognize conversion kit, but we indicated that we had 2nd edition supplemental monster sets and encountered no problems.
